casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas Shane WRIGHT. No. 483A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 2, 2005. Robert T. Newman, Asheboro, for Douglas S. Wright. Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of September 2005."
